reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Transition for a Sustainable Response to HIV and Tuberculosis in Panama 2019 - 2021

description.narrative: Panama - TB/HIV - United Nations Development Programme - UNDP Panama. This program has the following goals: Ensure the capacities of the healthcare system to provide sustainable HIV services. Ensure the capacities of the healthcare system to provide sustainable TB services. Facilitate prevention of HIV and TB in key populations. Facilitate access to comprehensive HIV and TB care services for key populations. The objectives of this program are: Establish the necessary capacities in the different institutions so that the country can implement an HIV response in its entirety with national funding. Establish the necessary capacities in the different institutions so that the country can implement an tuberculosis response in its entirety with national funding. Provide combined prevention packages to key populations for HIV and tuberculosis. Ensure that there is a link between the healthcare services and all the people of the key populations for HIV and tuberculosis who need it

title.narrative: Number of notified cases of all forms of TB (i.e. bacteriologically confirmed + clinically diagnosed), new and relapse cases

Treatment success rate- all forms: Percentage of TB cases, all forms, bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, successfully treated (cured plus treatment completed) among all TB cases registered for treatment during a specified period, new and relapse cases
Percentage of TG reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of HIV-positive new and relapse TB patients on ART during TB treatment
Percentage of people living with HIV currently receiving antiretroviral therapy
Percentage of transgender people that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Number of cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB that began second-line treatment
Percentage of transgender people reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of MSM reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Number of TB cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB notified
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services

Percentage of TG that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
